## IHeftLifecycleCleanHookOptions.addDeleteOperations property

Add delete operations, which will be performed at the beginning of Heft execution.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addDeleteOperations: (...deleteOperations: IDeleteOperation[]) => void;
```
